title: Where on earth can i purchase an additional rune page?
body:
It used to be in one of the tabs but now I can't find it. I've checked every single tab, suboption/filter at least 4 times.

Is this a glitch? Am I blind? Is it limited availability?

replies.body: Guys? help me? It's been two days and I still can't find it.

You can find it under the *Gameplay* section of the store. Be sure your sorting on the left side all says *Show All*, as shown in the screenshot below:

(Click to enlarge)

https://imgur.com/a/Voa4j

I hope that helped!
